description: Efficacy of biological treatments according to the line of treatment, earlier exposure, disease phenotype and patient characteristics.

metadata.author: Pascal Juillerat

metadata.title: Positioning biologics in the treatment of IBD: A practical guide - Which mechanism of action for whom?

description: Stratification of inflammatory bowel disease risk of progression based on disease severity and activity. BMI, body mass index; CDAI, Crohns Disease Activity Index; ESR, erythrocyte sedimentation rate; UCEIS, Ulcerative Colitis Endoscopic Index of Severity.

metadata.title: Approach to the Management of Recently Diagnosed Inflammatory Bowel Disease Patients: A Users Guide for Adult and Pediatric Gastroenterologists

description: Therapeutic strategies for the management of recentlydiagnosedulcerative colitis. IMMs include thiopurines and methotrexate. 5-ASA, 5-amino salicylic acid; ASUC, acute severe ulcerative colitis; IPAA, ileal pouch anal anastomosis.
